K01abhisdhu:1: The present text is edited to facilitate word-searches. The text is based on the
K01abhisdhu:2: manuscript of the transliteration of the AbhisamAcArika-Dharma of the MahAsAGghika-LokottaravAdins.
K01abhisdhu:3: Grammatical errors and the like have been left uncorrected,
K01abhisdhu:4: but preferred readings are occasionally given for conspicuous scribal errors.
K01abhisdhu:5: The symbols and editorial features are as follows:
K01abhisdhu:7: indicate that they should be supplied.
K01abhisdhu:8: (2) The letters which seem to be wrongly written are underlined. Immediately after them suggestion is supplied between ( ).
K01abhisdhu:9: (3) Letters in blue and underlined are to be omitted. No suggestion is supplied after them. This applies to the omission of the virAma.
K01abhisdhu:10: (4) The letters between [ ] indicate that they are obscure.
K01abhisdhu:13: (6) Symbols which seem to indicate virama are substituted by comma (” , “).
K01abhisdhu:14: (7) Symbols which seem to be SiddhaM,
K01abhisdhu:17: (8) Cancellations in the Ms. are not indicated.
K01abhisdhu:18: (9) J. refers to the Jinananda edition.
K01abhisdhu:19: (10) Compounds in which hiatus appears are hyphened.

K01abhisdhu:156: (2a6) ca na vistareṇa prātimokṣasūtraṃ śrotukāmā bhavanti /

K01abhisdhu:224: upasthānaśālāyām vā prahāṇaśālāyām vā maṇḍalamāḍe vā /

K01abhisdhu:228: atha dāni saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhava(2b6)ti /

K01abhisdhu:236: dvitīyasthavireṇa jānitavyaṃ ko śalākāṃ cārayiṣyati / ko
K01abhisdhu:249: oguṇṭhikākṛtena vā upānahārūḍhena vā hastehi vā anirmmāditehi
K01abhisdhu:252: omuñciya (3a1) ekāṃsakṛtena śalākā cārayitavyā śalākāṃ pi
K01abhisdhu:253: praticchantena na kṣamati oguṇṭhikākṛtena vā upānahārūḍhena vā
K01abhisdhu:258: yadā śalākā cāritā bhavanti bhikṣū gaṇitā bhavanti
K01abhisdhu:261: vasiṣyatha uta gamiṣyatha yadi tāva jalpanti /
K01abhisdhu:264: parikathā karttavyā dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśiya samādāpiya samuttejiya
K01abhisdhu:267: vaktavyaṃ / muhūrttan tāva bāhyato āgametha saṃgho tāva poṣadhaṃ
K01abhisdhu:271: yadi tāva atisītam vā ati-uṣṇam vā bhavati /
K01abhisdhu:273: vyādhidurbbalā vā bhavanti dūradūre vā pariveṇā bhavanti siṃhabhayam
K01abhisdhu:274: vā vyāghrabhayam vā corabhayam vā bhavati /
K01abhisdhu:282: atha dāni nātyātiśītaṃ na cātyāti-uṣṇaṃ na dūradūre
K01abhisdhu:284: bhikṣū ca sukhopaviṣṭā bhavanti vistareṇa śrotukāmā
K01abhisdhu:305: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā saṃghasya dāni poṣadho āyuṣmān nandano
K01abhisdhu:306: saṃghasthaviro upanandano dvitīyasthaviro āgato bhikṣū osarantikāye na
K01abhisdhu:307: āgacchanti dāyakadānapati pṛcchanti ārya samagro bhikṣusaṃgho bhikṣū
K01abhisdhu:308: āhaṃ,(3a7)su / nohīdaṃ dīrghāyu ko khu nāgacchati /
K01abhisdhu:310: (J.9) ete hi bhikṣū osarantikāye na āgacchanti /
K01abhisdhu:312: yeca(va) karmmāntāṃ cchoriya cchoriya āgatā āgacchāma /
K01abhisdhu:324: bhikṣavo evaṃ dāni saṃghasya poṣadho ti /
K01abhisdhu:335: ti dāni / evaṃ sarvvehi poṣadhe pratipadyitavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:337: khalv adya pakṣasya pratipadā dvitīyā yāvat pañcadaśī yadi dāni koci

K01abhisdhu:340: bhūṣīti / avaśyaṃ vaṃsavidalikāhi vā nalavidalikāhi vā likhitvā sūtreṇa
K01abhisdhu:341: ābra(bu)ṇitvā dvārakoṣṭhake vā prāsāde vā kalpiyakuṭikāyāṃ vā

K01abhisdhu:347: devasikaṃ yathājñāpeta katim ādya sarvvehi jānitavyaṃ / eṣo dāni

K01abhisdhu:356: purobhaktaṃ vā paścādbhaktam vā kati pauruṣāhi cchāyāhi kahiṃ

K01abhisdhu:401: śalākāṃ pi dāni praticchantena na kṣamati /
K01abhisdhu:402: anirmmāditakehi hastehi upānahārūḍhena vā oguṇṭhikākṛtena vā

K01abhisdhu:481: dvitīyasthaviro ti tad eva sarvvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati / yāva
K01abhisdhu:488: tena hi saṃghasthavireṇa evaṃ bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ /

K01abhisdhu:504: karmmikā te mātāpitarau katamaṃ deśaṃ gṛhaṃ katamāyāṃ rathyāyāṃ
K01abhisdhu:505: kuto mukhaṃ gṛhasya vā sākāraṃ soddeśaṃ pṛcchiyāṇaṃ tato

K01abhisdhu:536: atha dāni grīṣmo kālo bhavati śītalakasaṃgena
K01abhisdhu:538: atha (4b7) dāni varṣārātro kālo bhavati devāntarāyena anukālyaṃ
K01abhisdhu:543: bhavati / mahanto ca kālo bhavati kahiñci ca gantukāmo bhavati / kasyacita
K01abhisdhu:547: na dāni tena āmantritaṃ mayā ti
K01abhisdhu:554: kadāci maṅgalakaraṇīye atidakṣiṇaṃ prajñaptaṃ bhavati / tathā yeva
K01abhisdhu:556: atha dāni pretakaraṇīye anuvāmaṃ prajñaptaṃ bhavati /
K01abhisdhu:557: tathā yeva upaveṣṭavyaṃ nāpi dāni kṣamati /
K01abhisdhu:562: parivarjantehi dārakadārikāṃsa parivarjantehi praviśitavyaṃ / nāpi dāni
K01abhisdhu:573: atha dāni so manuṣyo anācīrṇṇadāno vā
K01abhisdhu:574: bhavati / tittino vā bhavati na dāni adhyupekṣitavyaṃ /

K01abhisdhu:582: vihāraśū(5a4)nyaṃ śakyaṃ karttuṃ ti laghu kālo atikramati /
K01abhisdhu:584: atha dāni grīṣmo vā varṣā vā rātro vā kālo bhavati cirehi kālo
K01abhisdhu:599: atha dāni so thokinā arthiko bhavati
K01abhisdhu:600: vaktavyaṃ mama thokaṃ dehi heṣṭhā bahuṃ evaṃ //
K01abhisdhu:603: māṃsasya olaṃkānāṃ dadhisya tato nāpi kṣamati saṃghasthavireṇa labdho
K01abhisdhu:606: atha khalu odanasampattir vvā āgamaṃtena bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:607: vyañjanasampattir vvā āgamaṃtena bhuñjitavyaṃ na bhuñjitvā hastaṃ
K01abhisdhu:612: upagrāyanti pānīyaṃ vā pibanti / hastām vā

K01abhisdhu:642: tā naṃ rakṣaṃtu tā ca naṃ pālayantu
K01abhisdhu:643: yathā naṃ icchati mātā yathā naṃ icchati pitā
K01abhisdhu:659: apare mārggam bhāvayitvā parinirvvānti anāśravā iti //
K01abhisdhu:664: nagnā nadī anodikā nagnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ arājakaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:665: istrī pi vidhavā nagnā sacesyā daśa bhrātaro
K01abhisdhu:668: istri pi peśalā bhavatu śrāddhā bhavatu pativratānugā
K01abhisdhu:671: puruṣo pi peśalā bhavatu śrāddho bhavatu vratā(5b5)nugo /
K01abhisdhu:672: śīlavāṃ tyāgasampanno samyagdṛṣṭi ca yo iha //
K01abhisdhu:673: ubhau śraddhāya sampannā ubhau śīlo(le)hi saṃvṛtā /
K01abhisdhu:676: tām eva bhāryāṃ careyā yo asyā sīlehi saṃvṛtā //
K01abhisdhu:681: (J.21) ādīptasmiṃ āgare yo niharati bhaṇḍakaṃ taṃ
K01abhisdhu:684: evam ādīpite loke mṛtyunā ca jarayā ca

K01abhisdhu:704: divā vā yadi vā rātrau devā rakṣantu dāyakān //
K01abhisdhu:714: atha khalu diśā sauvastikā dakṣiṇā vistareṇa dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā /

K01abhisdhu:726: so yaṃ śreṣṭhāyatane pratiṣṭhito pātrasaṃhṛto lābho prītiṃ janehi
K01abhisdhu:727: suvihitā tathā hi dinnaṃ imaṃ dānan ti /

K01abhisdhu:792: yadi tāva saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati dvitīyasthavireṇa
K01abhisdhu:797: asuke deśe asukāyāṃ rathyāyāṃ itthaṃnāmo nāma

K01abhisdhu:807: na pacyati tti jānitavyaṃ vipralabdho bhikṣusaṃgho ti /

K01abhisdhu:4245: mayā tava pādā tvaṃ ca mama na pratisaṃmodesi /
K01abhisdhu:4252: tadā tava mayā pādā vanditā so dāni
K01abhisdhu:4253: āha āyuṣman vācovāciṃ karentasya pādāṃ vandasi /
K01abhisdhu:4255: yaṃ tvaṃ mama pādāṃ vandintasya na pratisaṃmodesi /
K01abhisdhu:4266: kin ti dāni evaṃ pādā vanditavyā / evaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4268: eṣo dāni bhikṣu āgantuko āgato bhavati / tasya koci
K01abhisdhu:4270: so ca apareṇa bhikṣuṇā sārddham vācovāciṃ
K01abhisdhu:4271: karoti / nāpi kṣamati tasya taṃ velaṃ pādāṃ vandituṃ uśvāsa(ccāra)m vā
K01abhisdhu:4276: ṃ karentasya dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādantasya snāyati vā
K01abhisdhu:4285: pe // pātrapākaṃ dadantasya cīvaraṃ dhovantasya rajanikā paṭhantasya
K01abhisdhu:4289: karentasya pādāṃ dhovantasya hastā nirmmādantasya cetiyaṃ vandantasya
K01abhisdhu:4290: pātraṃ nirmmādentasya dhūpam vā pibantasya akṣiṇi vā añjantasya
K01abhisdhu:4291: pustakaṃ vācantasya pustakaṃ likhantasya varccakuṭīṃ gacchantasya
K01abhisdhu:4295: samavasthāye niṣaṇṇo bhavati taṃ velaṃ alīyāṇaṃ śīrṣeṇa pādāṃ
K01abhisdhu:4299: dentasya uddiśantasya vā nivāsantasya vā cīvaraṃ prāvarantasya tvaritaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4303: na kṣamati / upānahārūḍhena sāmīcīkarentena na kṣamati /
K01abhisdhu:4311: atha khalu tathā vanditavyaṃ / yathā na
K01abhisdhu:4316: āyuṣmanto anurāgatam āyuṣmanto māsi śrānto mā(27b5)
K01abhisdhu:4318: prakṣālehi hastāṃ nirmmādehi viśramāhi yadi tāva purebhakte āgato
K01abhisdhu:4338: (J.126) bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni
K01abhisdhu:4340: gṛhi-ālāpena ālāpenti ambe atte bhāva bhaṭṭa
K01abhisdhu:4354: āmba(ambe) atte bhāva bhaṭṭa tāta ahaṃgho he he ho kiṃ bhaṇasi tti /
K01abhisdhu:4357: evaṃ yūyaṃ gṛhi-ālāpena ālapetha / te(28a1)na hi na
K01abhisdhu:4358: kṣamati gṛhi-ālāpena ālapituṃ tena hi pratisaṃmoditavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4360: upālī kālajño velajño samayajño bhagavantam upasaṃkramiya pṛcchati /
K01abhisdhu:4361: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ navakehi bhikṣūhi sthavirā bhikṣū ālapitavyā / bhagavān
K01abhisdhu:4363: ti vā bhante ti vā āyuṣmante ti sthaviro dāni bhagavantaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4364: pṛcchati kathaṃ bhagavāṃ sthavirehi bhikṣūhi navakā bhikṣū (28a2) (J.127)
K01abhisdhu:4369: dāni bhikṣusya upādhyāyo vā ācāryo vā śabdāpayati /
K01abhisdhu:4377: bhaṇasīti / atha khalu vaktavyaṃ vandāmi upādhyāyaṃ vā / (28a3)
K01abhisdhu:4384: bhante vā āyuṣman ti vā kiṃ a(ā)
K01abhisdhu:4387: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā bhaginīm vā śabdāpayitukāmo bhavati nāyaṃ kṣamati
K01abhisdhu:4389: ambe tti vā atte ti vā bhaṭṭe ti vā /
K01abhisdhu:4392: atha dāni bhikṣusya pitā vā bhaginī vā
K01abhisdhu:4394: nāyaṃ kṣamati hā kiṃ bhaṇasi tti pravyāharttuṃ / atha khalu
K01abhisdhu:4395: vaktavyaṃ / sālohite kiṃ āṇapesi kiṃ karemi /
K01abhisdhu:4399: ṃ vā vihārasvāminīṃ vā śabdāpitukāmo bhavati / nāpi
K01abhisdhu:4400: kṣamati / ambe ti vā atte ti vā bhaṭṭe (28a5) ti vā /
K01abhisdhu:4403: vā vihārasvāmini ti vā śabdāpayitavyaṃ / bhikṣū
K01abhisdhu:4404: vā upāsakam vā dānapatim vā śabdāpayitukāmo (I.p.122)
K01abhisdhu:4406: kṣamati bhāve tti vā bhaṭṭe ti vā /
K01abhisdhu:4409: ti(ti tti) vā bhikṣū vā tehi śabdāpayati /
K01abhisdhu:4419: strī vā puruṣo vā mahanto bhavati / na dāni
K01abhisdhu:4420: mātāpitṛkaṃṭhena ālapitavyā mahallako mahallaketi vā vaktavyā / atha
K01abhisdhu:4422: ko te upādhyāyo ko te ācāryo vā na dāni vaktavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4427: asuko me upādhyāyo asuko me ācāryo ālapitavyaṃ, /
K01abhisdhu:4439: niṣaṇṇehi na pārenti kāryāṇi karttuṃ odhyāyanti /
K01abhisdhu:4455: madhye niṣaṇṇā te dāni tumbhehi niṣaṇṇehi na pārenti kāryāṇi karttuṃ, /
K01abhisdhu:4457: paśyatha bhaṇe vayaṃ yeva tāva niṣaṇṇā kāryāṇi
K01abhisdhu:4459: ime pi śramaṇakā gacchiyāṇaṃ madhye niṣaṇṇā naṣṭaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4471: ye imaṃ ca kāryaṃ allīyāmi tti /
K01abhisdhu:4480: atha khalu ekānte cchatraṃ nikṣipiya upānahāyo muṃciya
K01abhisdhu:4486: sukham bhavanto sukhaṃ mārṣa atha khalu ārogyāpiya
K01abhisdhu:4488: tādṛśe āsane upaviśitavyaṃ nāpi kṣamati / āsane
K01abhisdhu:4493: kuśalā bhavanti prāg eva te nairayikā bhavantīti /
K01abhisdhu:4495: kṣatriyā nāma yūyaṃ agro varṇṇo jyeṣṭho varṇṇo (28b6)
K01abhisdhu:4501: duve cakrāṇi dharmmacakraṃ balacakraṃ ca / tavāhaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4502: hitopasaṃhāreṇa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiye sukhaṃ ca paya(phā)sukhañ ca
K01abhisdhu:4509: (28b7) bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā
K01abhisdhu:4511: dāni sannipatitā kāryāṇi kariṣyāmo ti / te dāni
K01abhisdhu:4512: āyuṣmanto nandanopanandanā āgacchiyāṇaṃ madhye niṣaṇṇā te dāni tehi
K01abhisdhu:4516: yeca(va) tāva niṣaṇṇā kāryāṇi kariṣyāma nti(tti) /
K01abhisdhu:4528: nāma brāhmaṇaparṣā sannipatitā kāryāṇi kariṣyāma nti(tti) / yūyaṃ dāni
K01abhisdhu:4529: teṣāṃ gacchiyāṇaṃ madhye niṣaṇṇā te dāni tumbhehi niṣaṇṇehi na
K01abhisdhu:4533: yeva tāva niṣaṇṇā kāryāṇi kariṣyāmo ti /
K01abhisdhu:4536: naṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ kuto imeṣāṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ / āhaṃsu /
K01abhisdhu:4539: samyag bhikṣavo jano odhyāyanti tena hi evaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4549: atha khalu ye tahiṃ brāhmaṇamahattarakā bhavanti / te
K01abhisdhu:4561: dhāryantena upānahāhi ābaddhāhi brāhmaṇaparṣā āllīpituṃ / atha
K01abhisdhu:4564: nāpi dāni darśaṇopacāre nikṣipitavyaṃ / atha khalu
K01abhisdhu:4579: nindituṃ / māṇavakasya mānahatasya ihaloke bhūtasya kukkuṭo śūkaro
K01abhisdhu:4581: ko nirayo ṣaṣṭho nti(tti) / atha khalu
K01abhisdhu:4582: vaktavyaṃ / brāhmaṇa nāma yūyaṃ agro varṇṇo jyeṣṭho varṇṇo śreṣṭho
K01abhisdhu:4583: varṇṇo dvihi kulehi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ / loke
K01abhisdhu:4596: te dāni tehi niṣaṇṇehi na pārenti kāryāṇi
K01abhisdhu:4602: niṣaṇṇāḥ / naṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ kuto imeṣāṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ / etaṃ (29b1)
K01abhisdhu:4603: prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣūhi śrutaṃ bhikū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu /
K01abhisdhu:4612: yāvat paśyatha bhaṇe vayaṃ yeva tāva sannipatitā
K01abhisdhu:4620: tena hi evaṃ gṛhapatiparṣā upasaṃkramitavyā / kin ti
K01abhisdhu:4626: āllīpituṃ / atha khalu ye tatra gṛhapatimahattarakāḥ bhavanti / (29b3) te
K01abhisdhu:4632: allīyāma mā āllīyāmo nti(tti) / yadi tāva
K01abhisdhu:4638: dhāryantena upānahāhi ābaddhāhi gṛhapatiparṣā upasaṃkramituṃ / atha
K01abhisdhu:4647: yādṛśaṃ āsanaṃ labhyate tādṛśe āsane upaviśitavyaṃ / (J.134) nāpi dāni
K01abhisdhu:4648: kṣamati / kutsitum vā pansitum vā gṛ(29b5)
K01abhisdhu:4650: tulākūṭamānakūṭehi divasaṃ lokaṃ muṣaṃtā āsatha / atha khalu
K01abhisdhu:4652: sāgarā ca anagārā ca ubhe anyonyaniśritā
K01abhisdhu:4664: niśrāya tathāgate brahmacaryaṃ carathā mahato oghasya niḥsaraṇārthaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4680: bhaṇe ca(va)yaṃ yevaṃ tāva sannipatitā kāryāṇi kariṣyāmo ti / ime pi
K01abhisdhu:4693: yūyaṃ dāṇi gacchiyāṇa teṣāṃ madhye niṣaṇṇā /
K01abhisdhu:4699: tena hi evaṃ tīrthikaparṣā upasaṃkramitavyā / etaṃ dāni
K01abhisdhu:4702: bhikṣuṇā gatāgātasya tīrthikaparṣā upasaṃkramituṃ / atha khalu
K01abhisdhu:4705: kiñci tīrthikaparṣāye kāryaṃ āllīpāma mā āllī[yā]motha nti(tti) / yadi
K01abhisdhu:4729: praśaṃsā tam anupraśaṃśe teṣāṃ guṇam eva vadena doṣanti / vaktavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4730: duṣkaraṃ gṛhiliṅgāparityāgo duṣkaraṃ vastisaṃyamo duṣkaram araṇyavāso
K01abhisdhu:4741: atha khalu prakṛtyeva tāva upādhyāyo vā ācāryo vā āmantrayitavyo
K01abhisdhu:4756: śikṣā(30a7)kāmo anukūlo anunnaḍo acapalo pṛcchitavyo kiṃ kāryaṃ, /
K01abhisdhu:4757: āha / asukam vā asukam vā tena jānitavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4759: vaktavyaṃ / mā allīya atha dāni tasya saṃgraho bhavati vaktavyaṃ / āllīya
K01abhisdhu:4762: karttavyā / yā vṛddhatarakā yāvad vṛddhāntaṃ ukkasiyāṇaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4768: bhavati / kalahakārako bhaṇḍanakārako bhāṣyakāro adhikaraṇiko vā
K01abhisdhu:4769: vaktavyaṃ / mā jalpāhi tti kasya tvaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ samagrāṇāṃ sahitānāṃ
K01abhisdhu:4771: śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānānāṃ sukhañ ca phāsu(30b2)
K01abhisdhu:4773: kalahajāto bhaṇḍanajāto vigrahavivādāpanno viharanto saṃghe karkaśāni
K01abhisdhu:4779: anunnaḍo acapalo amukharo apragalbho aprakīrṇṇavāco saṃghasthavireṇa
K01abhisdhu:4783: śāsanaṃ ti tena kāryaṃ saṃghamadhye ārocayitavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4784: saṃghena tat kāryaṃ dharmmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena
K01abhisdhu:4786: vyupaśāntaṃ kariya so bhikṣu pṛcchitavyo āyuṣman
K01abhisdhu:4787: kiṃ vyupaśāntaṃ etaṃ kāryaṃ yadi tāva āha /
K01abhisdhu:4789: āyuṣman sarvve tvaṃ etaṃ kāryaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena saṃvyupaśāntaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4790: (30b4) punaḥ karmmāya utkhoṭayasi puno cāsmi parṣa upasaṃkramesi /
K01abhisdhu:4810: bhagavān samyaksambuddho yad arthaṃ samudāgato tam artham
K01abhisdhu:4813: yāva āraṇyakaṃ tāva śeyyāsanaṃ grāmāntikañ ca ekabhaktatarppaṇañ ca
K01abhisdhu:4814: grāmāntike śeyyāsane āraṇyakānāñ ca grāmāntikānāñ ca anugraho
K01abhisdhu:4815: sādhīyati / tehi dāni grāmāntikehi pratikṛtyeva gaṇḍiṃ āhaniyāṇaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4816: sthitāḥ / te dāni āraṇyakā deśakāle grāmāntikaṃ śeyyāsanaṃ āgatā
K01abhisdhu:4817: āhaṃsu / āyuṣmaṃ deśakālo āhanatha gaṇḍiṃ te (30b7)
K01abhisdhu:4821: āyuṣman / evaṃ yūyaṃ atyanukālye gaṇḍīṃ āhaniya bhuñjatha / te dāni
K01abhisdhu:4823: evaṃ ca yūyaṃ ati-uvahne āgacchatha / te dāni
K01abhisdhu:4832: āraṇyakehi te dāni teṣāṃ āraṇyakānāṃ āhaṃsu /
K01abhisdhu:4836: tathā tumhehiṃ pratikṛtyeva gaṇḍi āhaniyāṇaṃ bhuñjatha /
K01abhisdhu:4840: nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati pratikṛtyeva gaṇḍīṃ āhaniyāṇaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4847: kin ti dāni evaṃ āraṇyake vihāre
K01abhisdhu:4852: etaṃ dāni grāmāntikaṃ ca śeyyāsanaṃ āraṇyakañ ca śeyyāsanaṃ ca
K01abhisdhu:4866: thālī yadi tāva āraṇyakā āgatā bhavanti /
K01abhisdhu:4876: vaktavyaṃ / āyuṣman ete āraṇyakā āgacchanti prakṣipatha taṇḍulāni / atha
K01abhisdhu:4877: dāni kālaparyantaṃ nāgacchanti grāmāntikehi gaṇḍīṃ āhani(31a5)yāṇaṃ
K01abhisdhu:4887: yadi koci upāsako saṃghaṃ bhaktena nimantrayati / āha /
K01abhisdhu:4899: yadi arthikā bhaviṣyanti pratipālayiṣyantīti / atha khalu
K01abhisdhu:4901: yadi na sajjaṃ bhavati / na dāni
K01abhisdhu:4907: eṣo dāni koci grāmāntikāṃ bhaktena nimantreti / vaktavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4913: nti(tti) / atha dāni āraṇyakānāṃ pi nimantreti bhaktaṃ sajjayitavyaṃ / (J.143)
K01abhisdhu:4919: gaṇḍiṃ kālo pi tāva adyāpi bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4922: atha dāni dānapatī āha bhante āhanetha
K01abhisdhu:4923: tumhe a(ā)raṇyakā pi eṣyantīti kiṃ karttavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4936: ahaṃ pi ahaṃ pi tti vaktavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:4938: piṇḍapātaṃ ukkaḍḍhatha tehi āraṇyakānāṃ piṇḍapāto ukkaḍḍhayitavyo /
K01abhisdhu:4961: bhikṣuṃ pratisaṃmodiyāṇaṃ svakasvakehi āsanehi upaviśitavyaṃ / gaṇḍī
K01abhisdhu:4963: ya cetiyaṃ nāpi dāni āraṇyakehi grāmāntikā
K01abhisdhu:4964: kutsetavyā bahukṛtyā bahukaraṇīyā jihvāgre yūyaṃ rasāgrāṇi paryeṣatha /
K01abhisdhu:4977: pratikṛtyeva gaṇḍiṃ āhaniyāṇaṃ cetiyaṃ vandiya bhuñjituṃ / atha khalu
K01abhisdhu:4981: grāmāntikānāṃ yā āraṇyakānāṃ sthālī tahiṃ taṇḍulā prakṣipitavyāḥ /
K01abhisdhu:4982: yā grāmāntiṃkānāṃ sthālī yadi tāva grāmāntikā (31b7)
K01abhisdhu:4988: grāmāntikānāṃ grāmo paro vā bhave corā vā patitā bhaveṃsuḥ / yathā
K01abhisdhu:4995: hi tti / yadi tāva āgacchanti teṣāṃ pi (32a1)
K01abhisdhu:4998: deśakāle gaṇḍiṃ āhaniya cetiyaṃ vandiya bhuñjitavyaṃ
K01abhisdhu:5002: eṣo dāni koci āraṇyakānāṃ bhaktenopanimantrayati vaktavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:5005: taṃhiṃ śraddhā nāsti prasādo vaktavyaṃ vayaṃ pi na praticchāmo nti(tti) /
K01abhisdhu:5006: atha dāni (32a2) grāmāntikānām api nimaṃtreti bhaktaṃ sajjayitavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:5018: prāgo tāva adyāpi grāmāntikā ca bhikṣavo
K01abhisdhu:5036: ahaṃ pi ahaṃ pi tti vaktavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:5037: grāmāntikānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ piṇḍapātaṃ parigṛhnatha nti(tti) / atha dāni
K01abhisdhu:5042: yadi tāva kāle āgacchanti bhuñjanāye dātavyaṃ / atha dāni
K01abhisdhu:5045: śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ vā ārāmikānām vā dātavyo nāpi dāni kṣamati
K01abhisdhu:5048: śeyyāsanaṃ ukkasitavyaṃ pādāṃ prakṣāliya hastāṃ nirmmādiya stūpaṃ
K01abhisdhu:5056: dāni deśakālo bhavati vihāraṃ praviśiyāṇāṃ āraṇyakāṃ bhikṣūṃ
K01abhisdhu:5058: āhatāyaṃ stūpaṃ vandiyāṇaṃ bhuṃjiyāṇaṃ gantavyaṃ / nāpi dāni
K01abhisdhu:5064: yā śṛgālā pi āraṇye vasanti divasaṃ yūyaṃ
K01abhisdhu:5075: yāvakīyaṃ ca bhikṣavo āraṇyakāni śeyyāsanāni adhyāvasiṣyatha / tāva
K01abhisdhu:5077: kuśalehi dharmmehi no parihāṇi na ca vo
K01abhisdhu:5093: tato yyeva mukhaṃ tato yyeva hastāṃ nirmmādiyanti /
K01abhisdhu:5095: dhovanti / te dāni kalyato yeva nandanopanandanā utthiyāṇa hastāṃ
K01abhisdhu:5103: ayaṃ pānīyamaṇḍapo tāyitamudrito thapito etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣūhi
K01abhisdhu:5118: ayaṃ pānīyamaṇḍapo tāyitamudrito kariya thapito āhaṃsuḥ / āma
K01abhisdhu:5121: tena hi evaṃ pānīye pratipadyitavyaṃ / evaṃ
K01abhisdhu:5137: pānīyaṃ pariśrāviya golakā vā maṇikā vā uṣṭ(r)ikā
K01abhisdhu:5138: (32b6) vā thaganakā vā āraṃjarā vā ghaṭṭā vā karakīyo vā appihāṇā
K01abhisdhu:5140: mayā vā mṛttikāmayā vā kāṣṭhamayā vā acchehi
K01abhisdhu:5148: campakagulikā vā śarkarā vā sarvvaṅ ka(32b7)rttavyaṃ /
K01abhisdhu:5150: bhaveṃsu / tato yadi tāva anyaṃ pibanāye pānīyaṃ bhavati / anyaṃ
K01abhisdhu:5160: pātrodakasya pāribhogikasya kumbhikā ca karakā ca pūrayitavyā /
K01abhisdhu:5169: mathurāyāṃ yamunā na kṣamati tato pānīyāto
K01abhisdhu:5170: kalpiyakarakī vā akalpiyakarakī vā varccakumbhikā vā pūrayituṃ /
K01abhisdhu:5173: dātavyaṃ / atha dāni śrāddho bhikṣur bhavati /
